original_title:
Las Vegas tourism needs to be boycotted. American is at an MGM property and shows the prices on the menu

- The cheapest steak is $87
- Ribeye is $138
- His glass of Cabernet wine was $37
  — The Donald
article_summary: "Las Vegas tourism is being boycotted due to excessive prices at MGM properties, with a ribeye steak costing $138 and a glass of wine $37. Critics argue that the prices are outrageous and unjustified, suggesting alternative, cheaper options on Fremont Street."</s>
